General.Name: First Tin PLC
General.Description: First Tin Plc engages in the mining and development of tin in Germany and Australia. Its flagship assets include the Tellerhäuser Project in Saxony, Germany; and the Taronga Project in New South Wales, Australia. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: First Floor, London, United Kingdom, W1J 0DT
